text: Bruce Halle (May 27, 1930 - January 4, 2018) was an American businessman and the founder and chairman of Discount Tire. He was the wealthiest person in Arizona. He was born in Springfield, Massachusetts. He donated much of his money to Republican-related causes and politicians. Halle died on January 4, 2018, in Paradise Valley, Arizona at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Republicans (United States) Category:People from Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Bruce Halle
